name: Cursed Imbuement
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
The target weapon is cursed with unholy magic. For the duration, as long as it's held, the wielder takes unholy damage equal to your spellcasting stat at the end of each of their turns. On a successful attack with the weapon, you can choose to discharge the curse, dealing an additional 4d10 unholy damage to the attacked creature, and half of that unholy damage back to the wielder. The spell then ends.

Casting this spell on a weapon ends any other spells affecting that weapon.
empower: Unholy damage dealt by this spell reduces maximum hit points by the same amount.
